Key Match Events: Jeremy Sarmiento scored a goal for Ecuador just before halftime
Jhonder Cadiz equalized for Venezuela in the 64th minute
Eduard Bello scored the winning goal for Venezuela in the 74th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Ecuador played most of the match with 10 men after their captain Enner Valencia was sent off in the 22nd minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California, USA
